Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I cannot seem to access the KSP TV schedule! OH NOES! It says that I do not have the correct permissions to get to the page D: So can someone help me please?

Sneeze

P.S. Sorry if this is the wrong Forum, I wasn't sure which one to put it on.

Moving this over to the Kerbal Network subforum

I'll bring this to the attention of some of my more forum-savvy peers so that we can determine what's going on.
Never mind. I found it. Not sure why the Twitch link isn't working though.
The schedule's been taken down for some reformatting. It should be back up sometime tomorrow. Thanks.
